replies.body: I’m guessing it’s something to do with Shaco’s E being horrendously bad and fairly useless? Idk honestly

I was spamming "Shaco E" in Shaco mains Discord server because Shaco's E is a joke of an ability. One of the mods muted me and I made fun of this by saying the Shaco community is talking about Shaco E and Riot just puts Shaco mains on mute like Shaco's E is absolutely fine. Do you understand now?

> [{quoted}](name=SnackerMore,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FgoYGh1y,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-11-20T16:55:33.301+0000)
>
> I was spamming "Shaco E" in Shaco mains Discord server because Shaco's E is a joke of an ability. One of the mods muted me and I made fun of this by saying the Shaco community is talking about Shaco E and Riot just puts Shaco mains on mute like Shaco's E is absolutely fine. Do you understand now?

I mean his E isnt that bad, it's a good finishing ablity to close a fight i guess

> [{quoted}](name=Season 9 Shaco,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FgoYGh1y,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2019-06-02T04:54:59.679+0000)
>
> I mean his E isnt that bad, it's a good finishing ablity to close a fight i guess

100% wrong, the execute is complete dire. the 50% extra damage maxes out when the enemies hp is at 0, it's not capped. Garbage base damage, bad scalings and it's physical damage, since armour is easier to buy than magic resist it makes his E even worse

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=FgoYGh1y,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-19T21:45:56.243+0000)
>
> i dont get it

Me neither. Also, which Discord server is this?

As an eyewitness, I can confirm that this actually happened.
https://hakery.club/images/fc739fd06abc786d60b610bcf65ddf83.png
